01/ About Me

I made all this nonsense because I am still figuring out what to say about me in my profile so don't read too much into this

I am not a geek who spend my time traveling through East Africa. I just split most of my time between Mombasa, Kenya and Arusha, Tanzania, think of me as an East African citizen

I am a computer programmer and sometimes an asshole, I am also not a very 'Politically Correct' kind of guy so if you need someone to give you a pat on the back, i am not your guy

I love making web based software solutions. I work at WatabeLabs, check out the link for more about the company i work for

The picture you see on the right side? that's me when I am smiling, no kidding (you don't wanna come accross me when i am mad)

---end of story, keep coming back i might update this---
